ygData.subject: RE: RE: SoW vs. Accelerando vs. giants & charm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And after helping a paladin friend of mine camp for them a week or so ago, I think its shameful that any druid, shaman or bard ever get jboots for their
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 9:43 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: SoW vs. Accelerando vs. giants & charm
>
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Tsk, tsk, a bard with jbooties. Don't let the bard's union catch
> you! <g>
>
> Sylly.
>

And after helping a paladin friend of mine camp for them a week or so ago, I
think its shameful that any druid, shaman or bard ever get jboots for their
own. The jboots camp was enough to make me not ever want to play EQ again.

BTW, he ended up camping 15 hours and never got a pair...

Anthem Dirgemaker
33rd level bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
